roleset.name: try a case, offensively

role.descr: case, or defendant of that case
law justifying case, prosecuted for what?

example.name: prosecute a case
example.text: [The units]-1 are autonomous from U.S. attorneys' offices and focus exclusively on *trace*-1 prosecuting organized-crime cases.

example.name: prosecute a person
example.text: Opponents say Mr. Thornburgh's plan will needlessly break up longtime, tightly knit crime-fighting units that *traec* have successfully prosecuted major organized-crime figures.
example.arg: that -> longtime, tightly knit crime-fighting units

example.name: with law
example.text: [Mrs. Yeargin]-1 was fired and prosecuted *trace*-1 under an unusual South Carolina law that makes it a crime to breach test security.
example.arg: under an unusual South Carolina law that makes it a crime to breach test security

roleset.note:
These two examples demonstrate the interchangeability of the case and the person in that case.
VN class judgment-33.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'prosecute' based on sentences in wsj.
